verifier.task

Class Pool

  • java.lang.Object
    • verifier.task.Pool

  • public class Pool
extends java.lang.Object
    Use a job pool to compute a task in parallel. The parallelism comes from tasks which are dependent on any task given. (Any dependent tasks can be computed in parallel.)

      • getJob

        public Task getJob()
        Dequeue a task. If no task is available, this call will block until one becomes available.
        Returns:
        This method returns the dequeued task.

      • running

        public boolean running()
        Returns:
        This method returns true if the pool is running
